stimulusHtml: Although Lin's work was created about 900 years after Fan's, both works include which of the following that convey a similar meaning?

features.html:
© Fan Kuan/Corbis
© The Chambers Gallery, London/The Bridgeman Art Library

choicesHtml: Mountains that reach toward the heavens to evoke a sense of power and awe
A wealth of detail in the landscape that reflects intense study of nature
References to the four seasons in order to show the cyclical passage of time
Naturalistic depictions of actual mountains that viewers could recognize and name
